docs.text: About What is VulnAPI ? VulnAPI is tools to get detail information CVE with api based. So, you can improve this tools with other apps. Why I need this tools ? Feature api - use api to get detail information
docs.title: About

docs.text: VulnAPI is tools to get detail information CVE with api based. So, you can improve this tools with other apps.
docs.title: What is VulnAPI ?

docs.text: api - use api to get detail information
docs.title: Feature

docs.text: Feature Endpoints /api/vuln/{cve_id} - cve endpoints /api/vuln/{cwe_id} - cwe endpoints /api/vuln/{capec_id} - capec endpoints /api/vuln/generate/{cve_id} - generate file report by cve id How to use it ? CVE python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cve/ {cve_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/vuln/cve/{cve_id}?lang={code_languange}' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cve_id" : "string" , "cwe_id" : "string" , "cvss_score" : "string" , "capec" : [ lis t ], "description" : "string" } } CWE python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cwe_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cwe/ {cwe_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } } CAPEC python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( capec_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/capec/ {capec_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } } Generate File Report python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = f "/api/vuln/generate/ { cve_id } /pdf" url = host + endpoint params = { "cve_id" : cve_id , "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params , allow_redirects = True , stream = True ) if response . status_code == 200 : #write response file filename = ( response . headers . get ( "content-disposition" )) . split ( '"' ) with open ( filename [ 1 ], "wb" ) as file : for chunk in response . iter_content ( chunk_size = 1024 ): file . write ( chunk ) return filename return False curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/generate/{cve_id}/pdf?lang=en&requested_by=guest' \ -H 'accept: application/json' Filerespo nse Interactive API docs Now go to docs You will see the automatic interactive API documentation
docs.title: Feature

docs.text: /api/vuln/{cve_id} - cve endpoints /api/vuln/{cwe_id} - cwe endpoints /api/vuln/{capec_id} - capec endpoints /api/vuln/generate/{cve_id} - generate file report by cve id
docs.title: Endpoints

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cve/ {cve_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/vuln/cve/{cve_id}?lang={code_languange}' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cve_id" : "string" , "cwe_id" : "string" , "cvss_score" : "string" , "capec" : [ lis t ], "description" : "string" } }
docs.title: CVE

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cwe_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/cwe/ {cwe_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } }
docs.title: CWE

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( capec_id , lang ): endpoint = "/api/vuln/capec/ {capec_id} " url = host + endpoint params = { "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params ) return response . json () curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/cwe?lang=id&cwe_id=CWE-12' \ -H 'accept: application/json' { "message" : "success" , "status" : true , "data" :{ "cwe_id" : "string" , "name" : "string" , "description" : "string" } }
docs.title: CAPEC

docs.text: python curl reponse import requests #set host host = "http://127.0.0.1:9999" def get ( cve_id , lang ): endpoint = f "/api/vuln/generate/ { cve_id } /pdf" url = host + endpoint params = { "cve_id" : cve_id , "lang" : lang #you can selected other language } response = requests . get ( url = url , params = params , allow_redirects = True , stream = True ) if response . status_code == 200 : #write response file filename = ( response . headers . get ( "content-disposition" )) . split ( '"' ) with open ( filename [ 1 ], "wb" ) as file : for chunk in response . iter_content ( chunk_size = 1024 ): file . write ( chunk ) return filename return False curl -X 'GET' \ 'http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/vuln/generate/{cve_id}/pdf?lang=en&requested_by=guest' \ -H 'accept: application/json' Filerespo nse
docs.title: Generate File Report

docs.text: Now go to docs You will see the automatic interactive API documentation
docs.title: Interactive API docs
